body.p:
The publishing engine has support to dynamically convert various types of non-DITA resources to DITA while publishing:
Word to DITA Microsoft Word documents referenced in the DITA Map using the word-to-dita format attribute get dynamically converted to DITA topics during publishing. Image references and internal links are preserved. Example:<topicref href="sample.docx" format="word-to-dita"/>
Excel to DITA Microsoft Excel documents referenced in the DITA Map using the excel-to-dita format attribute get dynamically converted to DITA topics containing one or more tables during publishing. Example:<topicref href="sample.xlsx" format="excel-to-dita"/>
HTML to DITA HTML documents referenced in the DITA Map using the html-to-dita format attribute get dynamically converted to DITA topics during publishing. Example:<topicref href="sample.html" format="html-to-dita"/>
Markdown to DITA Markdown documents referenced in the DITA Map using the excel-to-dita format attribute get dynamically converted to DITA topics during publishing. Example:<topicref href="sample.md" format="markdown"/>
